Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: This kind of game can't be done much better. Good story\, tense atmosphere\, comprehensible characters\, relevant choices and a great presentation are good enough for me to make this one of the best games I played so far this year. In the category of this \"sorft of interactive movie\" it will be a hard duell with life is strange\, which has yet to prove that it can also end in a great way.
